video.unavailableDescription: This video has been marked as unavailable because it could not be loaded from any source. It will be automatically retried later.

comments.title: Comments
comments.replyHint: Ctrl+Enter to submit, Esc to cancel

share.title: Share this video
share.description: Share this video on your favorite platform or copy the link.

mirror.title: Mirror Video
mirror.description: Copy this video to additional blossom servers for better redundancy and availability.
mirror.noServers: No blossom servers configured. Add servers in your settings or publish a kind 10063 event with your preferred servers.
mirror.noSelectionMessage: Please select at least one server to mirror to.
mirror.notLoggedInMessage: Please log in to mirror videos.
mirror.failedMessage: Could not mirror to any servers. Please try again.

upload.title: Upload Video
upload.loginRequired: Please log in to upload videos
upload.uploadInfo: Uploading directly to {{upload}} server(s). Mirroring to {{mirror}} server(s).
upload.tip: Tip: MP4 (H.264) under 2GB uploads fastest and plays everywhere. We'll retry on backup servers automatically.
upload.quickStart: Quick start: leave on "Upload File". Use "From URL" only if your video is already hosted somewhere.
upload.noUploadServers: You do not have any Blossom server tagged with "initial upload".
upload.configureServers: Please go to Settings and assign the "initial upload" tag to at least one server.

form.title: Title
form.tagsHint: Press Enter to add tags, or paste space-separated tags

metadata.warningAv1: Warning: AV1 videos (av01) cannot be played on iOS or Safari browsers. Please use H.264/AVC for maximum compatibility.
metadata.warningVp9: Warning: VP9 videos (vp09) are not supported on iOS or Safari browsers. For maximum compatibility, use H.264/AVC.
metadata.warningH265: Warning: While H.265 (hev1) is widely supported, this video will not play on iOS/Apple devices. A hvc1 codec identifier is needed.
metadata.infoH265hvc1: Info: H.265/HEVC (hvc1) is widely supported. Only some de-googled Linux browsers may have issues.
metadata.successH264: Great: H.264/AVC (avc1) is the most widely supported video codec and will play on all browsers and devices.

cache.title: Cache Management
cache.description: Clear cached events and data to free up storage space. This will remove all locally stored Nostr events.
cache.clearDescription: Remove all cached events and data. The app will reload.
cache.note: Note: The app will reload to close database connections before clearing. Your account settings, relay configuration, and app preferences will not be affected.
cache.confirmMessage: This will permanently delete all cached Nostr events and data from your browser. The app will reload to reinitialize the cache.
cache.confirmWarning: This action cannot be undone, but events will be re-fetched from relays as needed.
cache.clearingMessage: The app will reload and clear the cache...
